text: The Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18 release date and time are right around the corner and viewers want to know the streaming details. In the previous episode, titled “Why Hello Sheriff,” Will Trent, uncovered several shocking truths about his past while investigating a murder and engaging in an argument with the local sheriff. Meanwhile, Ormewood’s diagnosis continued to bother him. Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode. When is the Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 13, and its release time is 8 PM ET / 5 PM PT on ABC. 12 am PT the next day on Hulu. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 13, 202508:00 PMPacific TimeMay 13, 202505:00 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Will Trent Season 3. Where to watch Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18 You can watch Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18 via ABC and a day later on Hulu. ABC is a broadcasting television network owned by Disney Entertainment. It broadcasts a wide range of popular shows such as Shifting Gears, The Rookie, and General Hospital. Hulu is a well-known streaming service that offers third-party content as well as original programming. Some of its exclusive content includes Only Murders in the Building, Good American Family, and Solar Opposites. What is Will Trent about? Will Trent is a police procedural drama series that follows a special agent who had a rough childhood growing up in a harsh foster care system. Now, he leverages his role to make a difference in society by cracking cases through his unique point of view and expertise. The official synopsis for Will Trent is as follows: “Special Agent Will Trent was abandoned at birth and endured a harsh coming-of-age in Atlanta’s overwhelmed foster care system. Determined to make sure no one feels as he did, he now has the highest clearance rate.”
html:
The Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18 release date and time are right around the corner and viewers want to know the streaming details.

In the previous episode, titled “Why Hello Sheriff,” Will Trent, uncovered several shocking truths about his past while investigating a murder and engaging in an argument with the local sheriff. Meanwhile, Ormewood’s diagnosis continued to bother him.

Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode.

When is the Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 13, and its release time is 8 PM ET / 5 PM PT on ABC. 12 am PT the next day on Hulu.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Will Trent Season 3.

Where to watch Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18

You can watch Will Trent Season 3 Episode 18 via ABC and a day later on Hulu.

ABC is a broadcasting television network owned by Disney Entertainment. It broadcasts a wide range of popular shows such as Shifting Gears, The Rookie, and General Hospital.

Hulu is a well-known streaming service that offers third-party content as well as original programming. Some of its exclusive content includes Only Murders in the Building, Good American Family, and Solar Opposites.

What is Will Trent about?

Will Trent is a police procedural drama series that follows a special agent who had a rough childhood growing up in a harsh foster care system. Now, he leverages his role to make a difference in society by cracking cases through his unique point of view and expertise.

The official synopsis for Will Trent is as follows:

“Special Agent Will Trent was abandoned at birth and endured a harsh coming-of-age in Atlanta’s overwhelmed foster care system. Determined to make sure no one feels as he did, he now has the highest clearance rate.”
